mmlviewport.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 #ifndef MMLVIEWPORT_H
00002 #define MMLVIEWPORT_H
00003 
00004 /* An equation is often rendered in a text context. Situations might occur in
00005    which the equation does not fit on a line and has to continue on the next
00006    line. This requirement is met with this class. A viewport is an area with a
00007    certain width in which part of the equation has to fit.
00008    If the equation does not fit in a viewport, only part of it is drawn in the
00009    current viewport and the rest of it is moved to the next viewport. */
00010 
00011 #include "boundpoint.h"
00012 
00013 class MMLDocument;
00014 
00015 class MMLViewPort {
00016 public:
00017         MMLViewPort();
00018         MMLViewPort(MMLDocument *);
00019         void setOwner(MMLDocument *o);
00020         void setX(float x) { this->x = x; }
00021         void setY(float y) { this->y = y; }
00022         void setWidth(float w) { width = w; }
00023         void setAscent(float a) { ascent = a; }
00024         void setDescent(float d) { descent = d; }
00025         void setBegin();
00026         void setBegin(const BoundPoint &b);
00027         void setEnd();
00028         void setEnd(const BoundPoint &e);
00029         void setMaxWidth(float);
00030         float getX() const { return x; }
00031         float getY() const { return y; }
00032         float getWidth() const { return width; }
00033         float getAscent() const { return ascent; }
00034         float getDescent() const { return descent; }
00035         const BoundPoint &getBegin() const;
00036         const BoundPoint &getEnd() const;
00037         bool isFull() const;
00038         void translate(float x, float y);
00039         bool fit(float width, float ascent, float descent) const;
00040         void add(float width, float ascent, float descent);
00041 private:
00042         bool full;
00043         float maxwidth;
00044         float width, ascent, descent;
00045         float x, y;
00046         float lx, ly;
00047         MMLDocument *owner;
00048         BoundPoint begin;
00049         BoundPoint end;
00050 };
00051 
00052 #endif
